resources.string: What is your date of birth?
Here is your age simplified and converted to different formats!
Here are some advices To help you keep your weight
Choose the right foods and Cook by yourself.

Depending on your credit card agreement, your bank may charge a fee on all foreign exchange transactions. Here you can enter that fee. It will be added on top of the calculation, so you know how much you really pay.
Couldn\'t update the exchange rates. No connection.
There was an API error. Please try again later.
Are you sure want to exit?

1.7.0 
‚∏ª 

Enjoy some big new feature in this release! 
Most notably, this app now includes historic rates. Check out the chart for the past year, to see how the currencies have developed. 

There's also an additional exchange rate provider: You can now choose fer.ee in the settings. A relatively new service, that behaves basically like frankfurter.app and is just one more choice for you. 

As always, this release includes updated libraries, small improvements and all the stuff that makes it even better. 
 
1.6.0 
‚∏ª 

Thanks to the support of awesome community members, this app is now not only localized in English and German, but also Spanish, French, Italian and Norwegian (Bokm√•l). Thanks so much for your help! üôèüôèüôè 

Small under-the-hood updates to make the app even more reliable. 
 
1.5.1 
‚∏ª 

Fixes a bug where the rates wouldn't update, when exchangerate.host is used. 

Library updates to improve stability and performance. 
 
1.5.0 
‚∏ª 

Select between two API providers: exchangerate.host and frankfurter.app 

You can now support the developer by donating with PayPal. Find the link in the settings. (F-Droid version only.) 

More UI improvements 
 
1.4.1 
‚∏ª 

UI improvements 
 
1.4.0 
‚∏ª 

It is now possible to manually refresh the rates. Check it out in the overflow menu. 

Performance improvements 
 
1.3.0 
‚∏ª 

So many more currencies! Over 160 in total, now!! That's because Currencies switched to a different API. The old one (exchangeratesapi.io) changed to a subscription model without any prior warning. NOT GOOD! Our new provider will be exchangerate.host. 

That also means, that the last couple of days, the exchange rates couldn't be refreshed. That's fixed now, of course. 

Also, the refresh process itself got improved, so at least next time something like that happens, you'll get a notice. 

Small UI improvements 
 
1.2.0 
‚∏ª 

17 new currencies! That's now 50 in total. ü•≥ Too many to name them all. However, a lot of popular vacation destinations in the middle east and the caribbean are now included: UAE, Qatar, Barbados, Bahamas, Cuba, ‚Ä¶ 

To stay on top of all those new choices, a search is now available in the currency picker. 

The picker now also shows a currency's full name, not only its code. An awesome addition, in combination with the search. Try it out! 
 
1.1.1 
‚∏ª 

Minor improvements (typo 'n stuff) 
 
1.1.0 
‚∏ª 

Depending on your credit card agreement, your bank may charge a fee on all foreign exchange transactions.
You can now include that fee in the calculations, so you know how much you really pay. üôÇ

App seems pretty stable: Public 1.0 release! ü•≥ü•≥ü•≥

Minor improvements 
 
0.2.0 
‚∏ª 

Added a copy function: Long click on the value you want to copy 
 
0.1.0 
‚∏ª 

More fail-proof updating of the currency rates 

Added a disclaimer 

Added this changelog 
 
0.0.1 
‚∏ª 

Initial pre-release

Exchangerate.host sources the currency rates from various financial data providers and banks, including the European Central Bank. All exchange rate data are delivered in midpoint data. Midpoint rates are determined by calculating the average median rate of Bid and Ask.\nAbout 160 currencies are included.
Frankfurter.app tracks reference exchange (forex) rates published by the European Central Bank.\nAbout 30 currencies are included.
Fer.ee is a relatively new service, that (just like Frankfurter.app) does track reference exchange (forex) rates that are published by the European Central Bank.\nAbout 30 currencies are included.
Exchange rates are updated around midnight UTC every working day.
The data is getting updated around 16:00 CET every working day.
Rates are updated every working day.

Although the app is very thoroughly written and tested, there is no guarantee that the data it shows is correct. The exchange rates are provided by a third party and this app can\'t make no promise whatsoever that the data is true and up-to-date.\nAdditionally, the rates provided ‚Äì still if correct ‚Äì may vary from the ones used by your bank.\nLastly: Mistakes happen. Never blindly trust anyone! That being said, rest assured I wouldn\'t have released this app if I\'ve had any doubt that it works as intended.
